channel.title: Were do i add this code

item.title: Were do i add this code
item.dc:creator: @s_3_3_m_3 s 3 3 m 3
item.description:
@s_3_3_m_3 wrote:

Okay, Im using delta, and i’ve never really worked with multi at all in my experience, but i am just wondering were do i add this code?

if (mage.multiCombat() && itMultis)
multiBarrage(splash, mage.playerId, spellID);
}

and i’ve already done added the other part which is this:

[code]public void multiBarrage(boolean splash, int otherPlayer, int spell){
int maxDamage = getSpellDamage(spell);
client c2 = getClient(otherPlayer);
for (Player p : server.playerHandler.players){
if (p == null)
continue;
client p2 = (client) p;
if (p2.playerName == null)
continue;
if (p2.playerId == otherPlayer)
continue;
if (!checkWildReqs(p2.playerId))
continue;
if (!checkMultiReqs(p2.playerId))
continue;
if (!p2.multiCombat())
continue;
if (p2.playerId == this.playerId)
continue;
if (p2.distanceToPoint(c2.absX, c2.absY) > 1)
continue;
if (splash){
p2.specGFX(85);
continue;
} else {
if (misc.random(mageAtk()) > misc.random(p2.mageDef())){
p.hitDiff = misc.random(maxDamage);
if (p.playerLevel[3] - p.hitDiff < 0)
p.hitDiff = p.playerLevel[3];
p.dealDamage(p.hitDiff);
p.updateRequired = true;
p.hitUpdateRequired = true;
p.hitDiff = p.hitDiff;
c2.KillerId = playerId;
p2.lowGFX(getEnd(spell),0);
p2.applySpellEffect(spell,playerId,p.hitDiff);
p2.playerLevel[5] -= (int) (p.hitDiff/4);
p2.sendPrayer();
} else {
p2.specGFX(85);
continue;
}

		}

            }
    }[/code]

and anyone know why i get 6 errors when i compile? after i added the public void i have 6 errors now, here they are feel free to take a look :

.\src\client.java:56: cannot find symbol symbol : method getSpellDamage(int) location: class client int maxDamage = getSpellDamage(spell); ^ .\src\client.java:66: cannot find symbol symbol : method checkWildReqs(int) location: class client if (!checkWildReqs(p2.playerId)) ^ .\src\client.java:68: cannot find symbol symbol : method checkMultiReqs(int) location: class client if (!checkMultiReqs(p2.playerId)) ^ .\src\client.java:80: cannot find symbol symbol : method mageAtk() location: class client if (misc.random(mageAtk()) > misc.random(p2.mage Def())){ ^ .\src\client.java:80: cannot find symbol symbol : method mageDef() location: class client if (misc.random(mageAtk()) > misc.random(p2.mage Def())){ ^ .\src\client.java:89: getEnd() in client cannot be applied to (int) p2.lowGFX(getEnd(spell),0); ^ .\src\client.java:90: cannot find symbol symbol : method applySpellEffect(int,int,int) location: class client p2.applySpellEffect(spell,playerId,p.hit Diff); ^ .\src\client.java:92: cannot find symbol symbol : method sendPrayer() location: class client p2.sendPrayer(); ^

Read full topic
item.source: Were do i add this code
